revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Hame |model=MPR-A1 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin=B008XD4BL0 |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/06/2013 |manuf_country=China |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=R7FA1 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=USB Female Mini-B |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT5350 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM63A165TS-6G |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT5350 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=3G capable,battery,portable |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=HAME_A1_XXXX |default_ssid_regex=^HAME_A1_[a-f0-9]{4}$ |default_ip=192.168.169.1 |default_user= |default_pass=hame |oui=9C:41:7C |oui_eth=9C:41:7C }} "MS-ME198407", "A1-V2.0+", and "A1-V2.1" is silkscreened on the multiple board types in the FCC photos.
The FCC test report states that this FCC ID applies to the A1, A1+, A1B, A1S, A1W, A2, A2B, A2S, and A2W.
Default settings are per the FCC manual. :The default SSID for the device is shown to be '''HAME_A1_XXXX'''. There are a fair number of entries for this SSID in '''WiGLE''' (generally / exclusively with 9C:41:7C OUIs). :The FCC manual also includes a list of compatibility tested 3G dongles.
